author: Fearless & Far
description:
I hiked into the Afar Desert of Ethiopia to reach Erta Ale, one of the only volcanoes on Earth with a permanent lava lake. For days, I lived on the rim—sleeping beside boiling rock, breathing smoke, and watching rivers of fire churn below me.

🔥 Welcome to the Gateway to Hell.
🌍 Deep in one of the harshest environments on the planet.
⏳ Few people ever make it here.

Join me as I trek across the desert with local Afar guides, camp under the stars beside molten lava, and witness the raw power of the Earth itself.

Join our Expeditions & Adventure Retreats
www.fearlessandfar.com/trips

title: Why People Risk Their Lives to Visit This Volcano
